Message:
“Let’s head down
to the lake today...
Wait, is something wrong,
Grita?”

Grita’s voice was
much colder than usual...

“Wh-Why not?
You can tell me anything!
We’re friends, aren’t we?”

I have to chase after her.
But, my legs won’t move...!

Did I do something
to make her mad...?
If I did, I guess it
only makes sense
she’d feel that way...

Even to the point of not
being my friend anymore...

...! If I did something wrong,
then I need to apologize...

I don’t want to quit
being friends...
Even if I can’t
make her come back,
I want to give her
a proper goodbye...!

I hurried outside.
I wonder where she went...?

As I hesitated,
I heard a distant scream.

Running in the direction
of the sound,
I saw Grita being attacked
by a cursed creature!

I jumped in front of the creature
without a second thought.

Its sharp claws dug deep
into my skin.
...It hurts...!

I don’t care what
happens to me...but...!

“I won’t let you hurt
my best friend!”

The moment the words
left my lips...
the cursed creature
went flying.
